author: cnbc.com
title: The RMR Group Inc. Announces Annual Meeting Results
text:
NEWTON, Mass.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- The RMR Group Inc. (Nasdaq: RMR) today announced the results of its 2018 Annual Meeting of Shareholders which was held yesterday.
Ann Logan was re-elected as an Independent Director. The final tabulation of the percentage of shareholders’ votes cast for this Director is as follows:
Director
Percentage of Shares Voted For
Ann Logan 99.1% Rosen Plevneliev was re-elected as an Independent Director. The final tabulation of the percentage of shareholders’ votes cast for this Director is as follows:
Director
Percentage of Shares Voted For
Rosen Plevneliev 99.0% Walter C. Watkins, Jr. was re-elected as an Independent Director. The final tabulation of the percentage of shareholders’ votes cast for this Director is as follows:
Director
Percentage of Shares Voted For
Walter C. Watkins, Jr. 99.1% Adam D. Portnoy was re-elected as a Managing Director. The final tabulation of the percentage of shareholders’ votes cast for this Director is as follows:
Director
Percentage of Shares Voted For
Adam D. Portnoy 98.2% Shareholders ratified the appointment of Ernst & Young LLP as RMR’s independent auditors to serve for the 2018 fiscal year. The final tabulation of the percentage of shareholders’ votes cast for this proposal is as follows:
Proposal
Percentage of Shares Voted For
Ratification of Independent Auditors 99.9% The RMR Group Inc. is a holding company, and substantially all of its business is conducted by its majority-owned subsidiary, The RMR Group LLC. The RMR Group LLC is an alternative asset management company that primarily provides management services to publicly traded REITs and real estate operating companies. As of December 31, 2017, The RMR Group LLC had approximately $30.0 billion of total assets under management, including more than 1,400 properties, and employed over 550 real estate professionals in more than 35 offices throughout the United States; the companies managed by The RMR Group LLC collectively had approximately 52,000 employees. The RMR Group Inc. is headquartered in Newton, Massachusetts.
